title: Ubisoft activist investor says it has support of 10% of shareholders in management tussle
description: AJ Investments, which has less than 1% stake in Ubisoft, said it was in talks with private equity firms for its push. The company's shares have declined more than 30% so far this month after the letter from AJ Investments dated September 9 and following Ubisoft's announcement that the release of the next "Assassin's Creed" game would be delayed by three months.
content: An activist investor pushing for a sale of "Assassin's Creed" maker Ubisoft has gathered support from 10% of the French videogame publisher's shareholders, it said in a letter on Thursday that was exclusively shared with Reuters.
